languages.text: "Мне тоже, шерин. Давай просто посидим". {n}Джай откидывается назад, тяжелые пряди мокрых волос падают на грудь. Она начинает мурлыкать нежную переливчатую песню. Вы не знаете, о чем она, но очень легко представить, что она о том, как усталые странники возвращаются домой после долгого похода, и горячий очаг согревает их озябшие усталые руки.{/n}

"So do I, shereen. Let's just sit here." {n}Jae moves back, her hair soaked and heavy, falling in thick locks across her chest. She begins to sing in a low, lilting voice. You do not know what the song is about, but it stirs up images in your mind's eye: of tired wanderers returning home after a long journey, and of a roaring fire warming cold and weary hands.{/n}

languages.text: “我也是，亲爱的，咱们就坐在这里吧。”{n}婕伊朝后挪了挪。她的头发湿透了，沉甸甸的，一绺绺垂在胸前。她用低沉的声音唱起了歌，虽然你不知道这首歌是关于什么的，但歌声在你的脑海中勾勒出了一幅幅画面：疲惫的游子长途跋涉，终于回到了家，熊熊燃烧的炉火温暖着游子冰冷而疲惫的双手。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So do I, shereen. Let's just sit here." {n}Jae moves back, her hair soaked and heavy, falling in thick locks across her chest. She begins to sing in a low, lilting voice. You do not know what the song is about, but it stirs up images in your mind's eye: of tired wanderers returning home after a long journey, and of a roaring fire warming cold and weary hands.{/n}

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしも。ここで、こうしていましょ」{n}ジェイは後ろに下がる。彼女の髪は濡れて重くなり、胸に厚くかかっていた。低く軽快な声で歌い始める。その歌が何を歌っているのかわからないが、あなたの脳裏には、長旅で疲れた放浪者たちが家路につく姿や、燃え盛る炎が冷たく疲れた手を温める姿が浮かんでくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So do I, shereen. Let's just sit here." {n}Jae moves back, her hair soaked and heavy, falling in thick locks across her chest. She begins to sing in a low, lilting voice. You do not know what the song is about, but it stirs up images in your mind's eye: of tired wanderers returning home after a long journey, and of a roaring fire warming cold and weary hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あたしも。ここで、こうしていましょ」{n}ジェイは後ろに下がる。彼女の髪は濡れて重くなり、胸に厚くかかっていた。低く軽快な声で歌い始める。その歌が何を歌っているのかわからないが、あなたの脳裏には、長旅で疲れた放浪者たちが家路につく姿や、燃え盛る炎が冷たく疲れた手を温める姿が浮かんでくる。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Y yo, shereen. Sentémonos un rato». {n}Jae se reclina, dejando que el peso de su pelo mojado caiga sobre su pecho. Empieza a cantar en voz baja. No sabes de qué trata la canción, pero evoca imágenes en tu mente: viajeros cansados volviendo a casa tras una larga travesía y un fuego abrasador calentando manos frías y exhaustas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So do I, shereen. Let's just sit here." {n}Jae moves back, her hair soaked and heavy, falling in thick locks across her chest. She begins to sing in a low, lilting voice. You do not know what the song is about, but it stirs up images in your mind's eye: of tired wanderers returning home after a long journey, and of a roaring fire warming cold and weary hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y yo, shereen. Sentémonos un rato». {n}Jae se reclina, dejando que el peso de su pelo mojado caiga sobre su pecho. Empieza a cantar en voz baja. No sabes de qué trata la canción, pero evoca imágenes en tu mente: viajeros cansados volviendo a casa tras una larga travesía y un fuego abrasador calentando manos frías y exhaustas.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Moi aussi, shereen. Oui, ne bougeons pas. » {n}Jae recule, ses cheveux lourds et trempés retombant en mèches épaisses sur sa poitrine, puis entonne une chanson d'une voix grave et mélodieuse. Bien que vous ne compreniez pas les paroles, des images vous viennent à l'esprit : celles de voyageurs fatigués rentrant chez eux après un long périple, et de flammes rugissantes réchauffant des mains froides et abîmées.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So do I, shereen. Let's just sit here." {n}Jae moves back, her hair soaked and heavy, falling in thick locks across her chest. She begins to sing in a low, lilting voice. You do not know what the song is about, but it stirs up images in your mind's eye: of tired wanderers returning home after a long journey, and of a roaring fire warming cold and weary hands.{/n}

Bien que vous ne compreniez pas les paroles, des images vous viennent à l'esprit : celles de voyageurs fatigués rentrant chez eux après un long périple, et de flammes rugissantes réchauffant des mains froides et abîmées.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Genau wie ich, Shereen. Lasst uns hier einfach sitzen." {n}Jae zieht sich zurück, ihr Haar ist schweißnass, schwer und ihre dicken Locken fallen über ihre Brust. Sie fängt mit leiser und lieblicher Stimme an zu singen. Du weißt nicht, worum es in dem Lied geht, aber es regt Bilder in deinem Kopf an – von erschöpften Wanderern, die nach einer langen Reise nach Hause zurückkehren, und von einem lodernden Feuer, das kalte und müde Hände wärmt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So do I, shereen. Let's just sit here." {n}Jae moves back, her hair soaked and heavy, falling in thick locks across her chest. She begins to sing in a low, lilting voice. You do not know what the song is about, but it stirs up images in your mind's eye: of tired wanderers returning home after a long journey, and of a roaring fire warming cold and weary hands.{/n}

Du weißt nicht, worum es in dem Lied geht, aber es regt Bilder in deinem Kopf an – von erschöpften Wanderern, die nach einer langen Reise nach Hause zurückkehren, und von einem lodernden Feuer, das kalte und müde Hände wärmt.{/n}

You do not know what the song is about, but it stirs up images in your mind's eye: of tired wanderers returning home after a long journey, and of a roaring fire warming cold and weary hands.{/n}

languages.text: "Benim de şirinim. Burada böylece oturalım." {n}Jae, geriye doğru yaslanıyor. Islanmış ve ağırlaşmış saçları, kalın bukleler hâlinde göğsüne düşüyor. Hafif bir sesle hareketli bir şarkı söylemeye başlıyor. Şarkının neyden bahsettiğini bilmiyorsun ama zihninde bazı imgeler belirmesine neden oluyor: Uzun bir yolculuğun ardından eve dönen yorgun gezginler ve onların soğuk ve yorgun ellerini ısıtan, hararetli bir ateş.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So do I, shereen. Let's just sit here." {n}Jae moves back, her hair soaked and heavy, falling in thick locks across her chest. She begins to sing in a low, lilting voice. You do not know what the song is about, but it stirs up images in your mind's eye: of tired wanderers returning home after a long journey, and of a roaring fire warming cold and weary hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Benim de şirinim. Burada böylece oturalım." {n}Jae geriye doğru yaslanıyor. Islanmış ve ağırlaşmış saçları, kalın bukleler hâlinde göğsüne düşüyor. Hafif bir sesle, hareketli bir şarkı söylemeye başlıyor. Şarkının neyden bahsettiğini bilmiyorsun ama zihninde bazı imgeler belirmesine neden oluyor. Uzun bir yolculuğun ardından eve dönen yorgun gezginler ve onların soğuk ve yorgun ellerini ısıtan, hararetli bir ateş.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
